content.question: Pepon Osorio created En la Barberia no se Llora (No Crying Allowed in the Barbershop) as

choices.label: an interactive installation that resembles a functioning barbershop
a light projection that incorporated the shadows of the viewers as participants
an immersive video installation featuring various sounds and smells
a painting combined with an assembly of personal objects from the artistâ€™s personal life

content.answer: an interactive installation that resembles a functioning barbershop

topic.text: 10.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
